game_description: Come & wonder around this beautifully landscaped theme park where Nexon's characters such as Dao and Bazzi appear. Interact with total strangers and make new friends online. Crazy World VR offers various mini-games you can play with others online, together with social & customization features.
review_1: I've always looked for something to play with my children and this is it! Cute but serious minigames are fun to play and the concept is interesting. Recommended for dads like me.
review_2: We didn't expect we are still playing this game. My kids love it so much.
review_3: Even better with fishing and stuff...liked it alot.
review_4: Mini games such as tennis or bowling, I think these refer to Wii sports, are not bad. It seems I can meet people at... lounge? or something, but I haven't met someone yet. The game has many contents, but shallow now. Need more updates, and users. I will recommend to play this game for VR/Quest beginners.
review_5: With the update, the game got sweeter. I like the new moods of the house!
